channel.title: RSC Adding commands to Up and Down Arrow Keys
channel.description:
How do i make the up and down arrow keys zoom in and zoom out?
what file would it be in, and what kind of command would it be?

item.title: RSC Adding commands to Up and Down Arrow Keys
item.dc:creator: @skarletdeath skarletdeath
item.description:
@skarletdeath wrote:

I don’t really understand were your gettin snoopy, but if anyone else has any helpful post on how i could get my zoom out and in to work it would be awsome, I’ve tryed this didn’t work maybe I did somthin wrong I don’t know for sure just didn’t work, really would like this feature.
Thanks,

Read full topic
item.source: RSC Adding commands to Up and Down Arrow Keys

item.title: RSC Adding commands to Up and Down Arrow Keys
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

skarletdeath:

all this does is makes my up and down keys record a movie>?

All the keys like pile up pile down or as yong’s page up page down are in numbers search on google.

you simple change the - case 1005 < to the right number and don’t duplicated it.

item.title: RSC Adding commands to Up and Down Arrow Keys
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

case 1004: // Page Up if(cameraHeight < 300){ cameraHeight += 25; }else{ cameraHeight -= 25; //displayMessage("@gr2@Zoom: @whi@" + cameraHeight + ".", 3, 0); } break; case 1005: // Page Down if(cameraHeight > 1500){ cameraHeight -= 25; }else{ cameraHeight += 25; //displayMessage("@gr2@Zoom: @whi@" + cameraHeight + ".", 3, 0); } break; [br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 03, 2009, 03:48:48 am[/size][hr]Mudclient.java and search for:

    protected final void handleMenuKeyDown(int key) {
        switch (key) {

As you can use the up arrow to display the last message sent to the server, just replace the cases with the code above.
